note.p: Career: First Lieutenant (1781); stationed at the Tower of London; appointed to the Ordnance Survey (1791); Director, Ordnance Survey (1798); Lieutenant Colonel (1804); Colonel (1814); Major-General (1819)
References: Derek Flinn, 'John MacCulloch, MD, FRS, and His Geological Map of Scotland: His Years in the Ordnance, 1795-1826' in NR 1981-82 vol 36 pp 83-101
David A Cumming, 'John MacCulloch, FRS, at Addiscombe: The Lectureships in Chemistry and Geology' in NR 1979-80 vol 34 pp 155-183
